alert.note: Alert for Clark; Dallas (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 3:48PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Clark and west central Dallas Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 348 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Gum Springs in Clark County, or over Arkadelphia, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Arkadelphia... Gum Springs in Clark County... Richwoods... Dalark... Griffithtown... Curtis... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
